name: Chaos Control (itch) (ludoxe)
description:
Warning ! There is no Quit button in the Windows Version, if you want to play it, I hope you know how to alt + f4 :P

Don't forget ! You can play the game in fullscreen if you click on the logo at the bottom right of the game

When you set together simple structures, can emerge chaotic structures. Inspired by the game of life and the butterfly effect. Made in 120h (I didn't know that there were a jam) for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

You are a mysterious evil guy who wants to eradicate humanity.

Send Chaos Cubes to Earth, but be careful, if you make one mistake, it can easily disorganized everything and make the level chaotic.

Use the rewinding time to set up a safe path for each cube and be prepared for chaos that will occur.

This game has 3 phases:

  1. Set the path of a cube 
  2. Like a rhythm game, press in time when a cube reaches a door. That will create lasers.
  3.  Avoid each lasers that can destroy the Core Chaos Cubes

After that, you come back to phase 1 with one more cube

If you survive with 8 cubes sent, you win.

Chaos Illustrations by Alix BLAIN

Music by PROMISIZE
